name: hub2cw
description: Post GitHub Status to Chatwork via Amazon SNS and Lambda

scripts.package: zip -q -r hub2cw.zip index.js lib templates node_modules
scripts.deploy: aws s3 cp hub2cw.zip s3://${S3_BUCKET} --acl private && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name ${FUNCTION_NAME} --s3-bucket ${S3_BUCKET} --s3-key hub2cw.zip --no-publish --region ap-northeast-1
